ygData.subject: Re: Wizard worries, please read.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... into ... Yes!  Please post some strategies, however long it may be.  I m sure it will be much appreciated.
ygData.messageBody:
> I have never had a problem with my playing style and my class, except for
> the multiple resistances. I am leveling with everyone else that I am
> constant contact with so there is not much of a problem. Start looking
into
> strategy instead of boom, boom, boom. From all that I seen Wizards are the
> most strategic class to play, if you don't like strategy and really aren't
> into role-playing a wizard, you will have a good amount of frustration.
>
> This has been my 2 cents in the matter I will not continue "Wizards suck
> <insert class here>s rule!" threads.
>
> Telor Strifesage of Karana
> PS. IF you guys want to see some nice Wizards strategies, just say so. I
> will place another long post with strategies.



Yes! Please post some strategies, however long it may be. I'm sure it will
be much appreciated.
